MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra knew her confrontation with Nikolaos made her a marked woman. She had to flee Megaris or face the wrath of the entire Spartan army for what she'd done.'

General_Description: '''Onwards to Phokis''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: After confronting [[Nikolaos]], Kassandra met with [[Barnabas]] to decide her next plan.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra departed the cliffs where she had finally met Nikolaos, returning to Barnabas aboard the ''[[Adrestia]]''.
*'''Barnabas:''' ''So, did you kill your father?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Stepfather.''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''I suppose the gods won't judge you too harshly for a "step-patricide."''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Nikolaos raised me. Trained me. He was my father, even if he did try to kill me.''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''Is that better or worse? No matter. Yours isn't the only complicated family in the world.''

<tabber>
|-|Thanks for your concern.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Thanks. I'm glad to have you around, Barnabas.''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''I'm happy to be here. Would anything else help?''
|-|Mind your own business.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''if you're trying to make me feel better, stop.''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''What would make you feel better then?''
</tabber>
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Finding my ''[[Myrrine|mater]]''. She's alive, Barnabas! At least... Nikolaos thought so.''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''Some good news, praise [[Hera]]. What's your plan? What course should I set, captain?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''For now, we go to [[Phokis]]. [[Elpenor]] said he'd meet me there. He owes me money and an explanation.''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''Aye, Kassandra. And let's seek the wisdom of the [[Pythia]] while we're there. If anyone has answers for you, it's the Oracle of Delphi.''

<tabber>
|-|The Oracle is a menace.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The Oracle's predictions destroyed my family.''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''The Pythia has the wisdom of Apollo himself! Now I'll admit, if people choose to ignore her, they might court disaster—''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If we'd ignored the Pythia, my brother would still be alive and our mother would be safe at home.''
|-|I'll consider seeing the Oracle.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll think about it.''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''Good. You know, kings and queens travel to Phokis to consult the Pythia. She can start wars or end them. They say that—''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Yes, I know. That's enough Oracle talk for now.''
</tabber>
*'''Barnabas:''' ''Back to business. You know where to meet Elpenor, I suppose?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''His home is in [[Pilgrim's Landing]]. But... Nikolaos's last words to me were a warning of snakes in the grass.''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''Sounds like you should make extra preparations.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Elpenor is the one who should prepare.''
*'''Barnabas:''' ''Meet me at [[Apollo]]'s [[Temple of Apollo (Delphi)|temple]] in [[Sanctuary of Delphi|Delphi]] when you're done dealing with the snakes.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Elpenor has a lot of explaining to do.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra returned to the ''Adrestia'' and talked with Barnabas about her next step.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] ''
